original_title: New SLC Selection Committee to meet today
original_body_lines: The newly-appointed Sri Lanka Cricket (SLC) Selection Committee headed by former cricketer Upul Tharanga is scheduled to meet at the SLC head office today (18).
It is reported that the committee is expected to reach several decisions pertaining to the national team during today’s meeting.

The cricket selection committee will meet today with the view of selecting the Sri Lankan squad for the upcoming Sri Lanka – Zimbabwe tournament which kick-starts on January 06, as per internal sources.
It is further stated that attention will be drawn to the team’s captaincy for all three formats – Test, One Day International and T20 cricket, during this discussion.
